entry.title: Movie: Exodus: Gods and Kings, starring Christian Bale (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Exodus: Gods and Kings, starring Christian Bale (2014)20150401
I enjoyed this a lot. I like the way that God was depicted. I like
the preamble and how Moses felt about what was happening. I wished
it went more into the time spent post-Egypt, but I understand why
that's less epic.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Interstellar, starring Matthew McConaughey (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Interstellar, starring Matthew McConaughey (2014)20150328
This was an amazing movie. One of the best ones I've seen in a long
time. I loved how "big" the story was. The ending was super choice.

entry.title: Movie: Insurgent, starring Shailene Woodley (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Insurgent, starring Shailene Woodley (2014)20150328
I felt like this was a lot more exciting than the previous one, but
less cool in terms showing the world. I felt like the ending and a
lot of other things were different than the book. I just did a
little review and confirmed that. I like the "box" concept but I
think the ending is the weirdest change.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Game: The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds (3DS, 2013) (12)
entry.content:
Game: The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds (3DS, 2013) (12)20150325
I beat the game today. The ending was pretty cool and the last
boss was pretty tough. I ended up managing to never die in the
whole game though. This game is good... but not as good as LttP.

Total time: 12:49

conversation!

--

The Back to the Future reference! Awesome!!!

What a cute ending. The tribe's "saying" was funny.

entry.title: Movie: Ted, starring Mark Wahlberg (2012)
entry.content:
Movie: Ted, starring Mark Wahlberg (2012)20150320
The opening scene showed an NES Action Set being opened in 1985 and
in Boston, but in 1985, the NES was packaged with R.O.B. and was
only available in New York City.

I love the bear's Boston accent.

What a ridiculous movie.
  • Movies
  • 2012

entry.title: Movie: American Gangster, starring Denzel Washington (2007)
entry.content:
Movie: American Gangster, starring Denzel Washington (2007)20150319
I liked when he bought his mom a house! I also like the way the two
stories are merged together. Oh man. I love the Rza! The coat got
him SO bad.

"If you stop bringing dope into this country, about a hundred
thousand people would be out of a job." --- Very wise.

In the post-drive-by scene, Denzel is acting like Pacino in The
Godfather Part II in Tahoe.

I feel like the chummy-ness at the end happened too fast.
  • Movies
  • 2007

entry.title: Game: The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds (3DS, 2013) (9)
entry.content:
Game: The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds (3DS, 2013) (9)20150317
I played today on a flight about two and a half hours. I did a
surprising number of dungeons. I like the callbacks to the old
bosses. It's a pretty fun game. Some of the puzzles are way easier
than I think they will be, so I start doing them wrong because I
think it can't possibly be done that way.

Total time: 9:46
  • Video Games
  • The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds
  • 3DS
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (8)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (8)20150316
I've decided to stop playing this game. I'm not enjoying the
battle system and I'm pretty familiar with how the story plays
out. I remember this game being much more fun. I think the problem
is that I'm stressed about rotating everyone in: this makes it so
I have to deliberately try to not kill things, so I can't enjoy
having lots of power. Worse, I'm constantly out of spheres and I
have to grind throughout the whole game. Basically, I'm playing it
in a bad way, but it's the way I want and that makes it un-fun.

Total time: 15:30
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy 10 (HD Remaster)
  • PS3
  • 2014

entry.title: Game: Malicious (PSN, 2012)
entry.content:
Game: Malicious (PSN, 2012)20150316
I played one level of this game and tried what was suggested as
the next level. It is an interesting game, but a waste of time
compared to Bayonetta and DMC. The idea of immediately going into
a boss fight and just having plebs for gathering power is
reminiscent of Alien Solider and Gunstar Heroes, which is an
interesting idea and a good thing to hearken back to. I feel like
the game's controls are not very responsive, especially the
dodging system. I feel like this was a waste of money. :( 

Total time: 0:34
  • Video Games
  • Malicious
  • PSN
  • 2012
